name: Futari no Maharaja
nutshell: Betrayed and robbed by his friend after arriving in India, Maya is left for dead in the middle of nowhere. As he's lying on the ground half conscious, he sees a white tiger that whispers, "Raton," and then transforms into a beautiful green-eyed man with long black hair who kisses him and then disappears. Caught by strange men after frantically searching for his false friend and belongings Maya encounters his mysterious apparition again but this man, Maharaja Vishuvendora, doesn't have black hair and green eyes. While sheltering at the Maharaja's compound who should Maya encounter wandering the grounds but his mysterious black haired Raton. Thus begins another exotic offering from Tamaquis-sensei.

name: Akuyaku Reijou ni Happy End no Shukufuku! Anthology Comic

This is Mag-Garden's villainess anthology. Happy endings for the villainesses!

name: Cover Up
nutshell:
Tattoo artist Geumhwa was invited to meet Seungjae's son of a gangster family to help him cover the scar on his back. But behind the scar that can't be hidden is another story ‚Ä¶ The tattoo depicts the story between two people who once lived in violence.
Vietnamese version

name: Gundam MSV Ace Pilot Series of Biographies
nutshell: The Gundam MSV Ace Pilot Series of Biographies originally ran in Comic Bon Bon magazine from December 1983 until July of 1984 and focused on three heroes: Johnny Ridden, Shin Matsunaga and Roy Greenwood. These same three characters would later pop up (along with Thomas Kurtz) in their own individual stories by Oki Hajime, only this time under the title of ‚ÄúGundam Pilot Series of Biographies.‚Äù

name: Gyeonwoo and the Priestess
tags: Ghosts,Long Strip,Romance,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Supernatural,Mystery,Full Color
nutshell: Park Seong-Ah is a high school student by day and shaman by night. In the shaman's eyes, the people who are close to death walk upside-down‚Ä¶ And one of these people is her crush!

name: Fate/stay night - Omaenomonoha orenomonoha orenomono (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Contains three oneshots parodying Fate/Stay Night, mostly centered around Rider, Euryale, and Stheno.
Pages: 24
Released: 2006-08-13
Adult: No
Language: Japanese
Circles: Kiheitai Áï∏ÂÖµÈöä

name: Fullmetal Alchemist - Night Flyer (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Ed had a bad dream. The night like today, Edward sleeps in the Alphones's arms.

name: Yuurei ni Natta Onnanoko ga Pantsu wo Miseru Manga
nutshell: A manga about a girl who became a ghost due to an accident.

name: Ragnarok M Stories: Laziest Creator
nutshell: This is a series of screen shots taken from the game Ragnarok M: Eternal Love. It covers the Story of a Lazy Creator (Creator is a Job in Merchant Branch job). Merchant -> Alchemist -> Creator and then soon to be a Genetic.

name: Shinanaide! Asukawa-san
nutshell: Youth is so embarrassing that she wants to die! An elegy of a completely ‚Äúself-conscious‚Äù person. Being too focused on what other people think of her‚Ä¶ will Asukawa be able to spend her time in high school safely?!

name: Joshiyu
nutshell: Wholesome(Read: Non-H) Doujin about a JC and a OL going on a trip.

name: I Don't Know What My Little Sister's Friend Is Thinking!  (Pre-serialization)
nutshell:
Chie-chan has a deadpan friend, Tsuyu-chan, and Chie's older brother has no idea what she is thinking. Only thing he knows is that she's paying him a lot of attention, glaring at him and avoiding him‚Ä¶
Twitter series, translated by Baby One More Time with permission of the author.

name: Defective Goddess' Genesis of Another World
nutshell:
Artesia Gaia Nagasus,
The goddess of creation went into a deep slumber in order to bring new life to the fallen planet,
And to prepare for the inevitable arrival of the Brave, whom she would then provide with guidance.
However, she woke up too early‚Ä¶ Not only was there no Brave waiting for her, she was met with an extremely cold glacial period without intelligent life‚Ä¶?!
She just wants to be worshipped and fall in love!
This is a tale of creation, starring a defective goddess who can't help but mess with humanity, and her journey to set the world in motion - with a few troubles here, and a little hard work there.

name: Eternal Burning
nutshell:
The human body is a representation of the world, controlled by internal desires. Desire is driven by will. The will communicates desires through the body and governs our world.
When your world becomes dazzling and shining like never before because of the arrival of a person, you should be alert. That is the collapse of will.
Shang Muxiao x Bei Jie
Indifferent college student x cold and rational associate professor in a wheelchair

Additional: Age gap, College student X Professor

name: Haikyuu!! - This Shadow is Made of Ashes (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Kageyama x Hinata
Do you know the story of the Icarus and the sun? This story by Bubunhanten symbolizes the tragic tale of the Icarus, the boy who lost his wings when he flew too close to sun, but in the perspective of love. It tells the story of the boy, Kageyama, who got too close to the sun, Hinata.

name: Brother Complex Onii-san, Kocchi Muite
nutshell:
After his angelic brother‚Äôs birth 17 years ago, Haruhisa became an extreme brocon the moment he laid eyes on him. He poured all his love into his little brother in their busy parents‚Äô stead, putting his own needs aside.
On the day of his precious brother‚Äôs teacher-parent conference, Haruhisa marches in, ready to evaluate Mitsuhara‚Äôs worth as a homeroom teacher.
A few days later, Haruhisa discovers that his brother has a lover! Moreover, it‚Äôs a male student from the same high school!? Turning to Mitsuhara to find out the truth, Haruhisa is suddenly kissed for some reason‚Ä¶?

name: Cats Own the World
nutshell:
Though Chichi the cat looks very cute, she has one goal: eradicate humanity and take over the world! She decides to recruit comrades to aid him in her quest, but it looks like world conquest won't be that easy?!
Follow the adventures of Chichi the tyrant, Dunno the doggo who loves humans, and Kaiser Kang Taeshik, the hard-boiled wild hamster, as they face many hardships on their path to absolute dominion!

name: Kimi ni Somaru Monochrome
nutshell: Hajime Haibara is a boy whose first love has faded away. A mysterious senior student, Bikyu, appears in front of him and invites him into a "new world". Hajime falls in love with Bikyu while being pushed around by her!

name: Seeking for Death
nutshell: Kominato Riku is a high school student who aims to be a game designer. The girl next door is his childhood friend Haju, is in love with him, but he has fallen head over heels for the school idol Riko. And lastly, there is the transfer student, Nodoka. With that all said you‚Äôd think this is the start of some love-comedy harem, but a rumor spreads that Nodoka receives a message that says, ‚Äúyou will die soon‚Äù. Riku and the gang‚Äôs fate will change in a major way. Who will live, and who will love?

name: GOD EATER - the spiral fate
nutshell: It is the year 2071. The world is is coverd in sand and ruled by wild gods. Kagami Ryo moves from Finland to what was formerly Japan.

name: Touhou - What Else I Wish For (Doujinshi)
Till The End Of The Moon
nutshell: In an era where the Demon King rules, with his demons running amok and causing chaos in the world. The remaining cultivator elders, in a desperate attempt to stop him, send Li Su Su back in time to prevent a mortal man from awakening to the current Demon King Tan Tai Jin (that is ready to shed their blood). Li Su Su, her eyes filled with anger, sadness, and determination, stares back at Demon King and swears that he will die for the evil deeds that he has done. Now a mortal after being sent back in time, she witnesses the life of Ye Xi Wu which ends up making it complicated for her to complete her mission.

name: Yarisugi Brothers
nutshell:
From YaoiOtaku:
‚ÄúHinata‚Äôs violence against me is my reward‚Äù
Hinata is a good looking model who is arrogant and selfish. In order to correct his son‚Äôs troublesome personality, his father makes arrangements to welcome a step ‚Äúbrother‚Äù into the family. Yue, a lawyer in the making, loves his ‚Äúbrother‚Äù and is a big perv who chases after Hinata‚Äôs ass with a straight face! While living under the same roof, will Hinata be able to protect his chastity!?
Sexual assault in the train, getting fucked by a mob in a porno, a prostate massage at the beach, and sexual cleansing full of love, everything in one book!
A never before seen ending that involves having to hold back voices during a sexy time, while family‚Äôs asleepüíö

name: Steins;Gate - Aishin Meizu no Babel
nutshell:
An alternate take on the original Steins;Gate story, this time told from Makise Kurisu's point of view.
After meeting Okabe Rintaro and the rest of the Lab Members, Kurisu reflects on her past with her estranged father and seeks to set things right with him, not knowing of the fate that awaits her.
Part of Steins;Gate series.

name: BanG Dream! - Absolute Diet Declaration! (doujinshi)
nutshell:
A story of Tomoe watching over Himari who's going on a diet.

Author's Twitter

name: Match the Beat!
nutshell: A very different anti-war comedy romance between the ultra-short Boram and Iljin Basketball Club Choi Gyeom!

name: Hanataba Keikaku
nutshell: Two immortals make preparations for their death.

name: Ai You De Mi Shi
nutshell: I thought it was just an ordinary escape room, but who knew it was the beginning of a nightmare.

name: Underground Underground
nutshell: Oneshot manga included in 138E
